short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display TrueProject data from any website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Designed exclusively for use by subscribers of TrueProject, the predictive intelligence solution for improving project health.

TrueProject Instant Insight is a Chrome extension that enhances project management efficiency by offering immediate access to critical project information for registered and authorized TrueProject users.

Users can conveniently hover over project names across various platforms like emails and dashboards to get the latest project updates instantly, without the need to switch between different applications.

The extension is designed to be non-intrusive, context-sensitive, and fully configurable to fit into any workflow, providing users with real-time insights wherever project names are mentioned.
